net.iso2013.mlapi.api.tag

Interface TagController


  • public interface TagController
    Represents a controller for a set of Tag instances. Controllers may be applied by default to a select array of entity types (see getAutoApplyFor()), or may be used for one tag in specific (see Tag.addTagController(TagController)). This interface is meant to be implemented in order to further control how tags are processed and viewed by players in the world.
    Since:
    May 23rd, 2018
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TagController.TagLine
      Represents a specific line in a Tag.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.bukkit.entity.EntityType[] getAutoApplyFor()
      Get an array of entity types which this tag controller will be automatically applied for.
      List<TagController.TagLine> getFor(org.bukkit.entity.Entity target)
      Get a List of tag lines to be shown for the specified entity.
      default String getName(org.bukkit.entity.Entity target, org.bukkit.entity.Player viewer, String previous)
      Get the name to be displayed for the target with respect to the viewer.

      Get this tag controller's priority with regards to name updates.
      org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getPlugin()
      Get an instance of the JavaPlugin implementing this controller.
      int getPriority()
      Get this tag controller's priority.

    • Method Detail

      • getFor

        List<TagController.TagLine> getFor(org.bukkit.entity.Entity target)
        Get a List of tag lines to be shown for the specified entity. The value returned by this method should never be modified during the lifetime of a single instance of the server. The values should be constant.
        Parameters:
        target - the entity for which to retrieve tag lines
        Returns:
        the lines to display

      • getName

        default String getName(org.bukkit.entity.Entity target,
                       org.bukkit.entity.Player viewer,
                       String previous)
        Get the name to be displayed for the target with respect to the viewer. This method will be called when an entity's tag has been updated for any reason.
        Parameters:
        target - the entity for which to retrieve the name
        viewer - the player for whom to retrieve the name
        previous - the name prior to this update invocation
        Returns:
        the new name to be displayed

      • getAutoApplyFor

        org.bukkit.entity.EntityType[] getAutoApplyFor()
        Get an array of entity types which this tag controller will be automatically applied for.
        Returns:
        the entity types

      • getPlugin

        org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getPlugin()
        Get an instance of the JavaPlugin implementing this controller. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        the controlling plugin

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        Get this tag controller's priority. Higher priority controllers are rendered above lower priority controllers. The higher the integer, the higher the priority. Negative priorities are supported such that -1 is of a lower priority than 0.
        Returns:
        this controller's priority

      • getNamePriority

        int getNamePriority()
        Get this tag controller's priority with regards to name updates. Higher priority controllers are run after lower priority controllers. The higher the integer, the higher the priority. Negative priorities are supported such that -1 is of a lower priority than 0.
        Returns:
        this controller's name priority
